amount.description: either the string "any" (e.g. for donations) or a positive value in millisatoshi precision

description.description: a short description of purpose of the offer

label.description: an internal-use name for the offer

quantity_max.description: specifies the number of items up (and including) this maximum

absolute_expiry.description: the time the offer is valid until, in seconds since the first day of 1970 UTC

time_unit.description: a positive number referring to a time unit - 0 (seconds), 1 (days), 2 (months), 3 (years)

period.description: the positive number which the time unit refers to

time_unit_name.description: the name of the specified time unit - either  "seconds", "minutes", "hours", "days", "weeks" or "years"

basetime.description: time in seconds since the first day of 1970 UTC

start_any_period.description: whether or not the invoice should start at any period

seconds_before.description: number of seconds before the start of a period in which an invoice and payment is valid

seconds_after.description: number of seconds after the start of a period in which an invoice and payment is valid

proportional_amount.description: indicates whether the amount of the invoice will be scaled by the time remaining in the period

recurrence_limit.description: the maximum recurrence period which exists

single_use.description: indicates that the offer is only valid once
